citations.desc: Attending veterinarian and adequate veterinary care (dealers and exhibitors).
citations.narrative:
The facility does not have a current formal arrangement with an Attending Veterinarian. While the facility does have
informal arrangements with other veterinarians who provide care for the animals – the Program of Veterinary Care is
signed by the former Attending Veterinarian who is stated to no longer serve this facility.
Correct by updating the Program of Veterinary Care and documenting a formal arrangement with an Attending
Veterinarian so as to ensure adequate veterinary care to the facility’s animals in accordance with the AWA. Correct by
August 31, 2024.

citations.desc: Environment enhancement to promote psychological well-being.
citations.narrative:
The facility does not have a written environmental enhancement plan for birds as is required by the AWA. An
environmental enhancement plan must be developed, documented, and approved by the attending veterinarian to
promote the health and psychological well-being of birds.
Correct by ensuring that a complete, documented plan for environmental enhancement - that addresses the required
elements, and is approved by the attending veterinarian - is maintained and available for inspection. Correct by
September 30, 2024.
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the licensee.
